replies.body: {{champion:72}} ummm,I know that this new system is good,so I want to ask will this system set on normal games?
We will be getting the new champ select for blind pick normals soon™
Would just like to apologize for previous comment. I was a bit salty but i understand it is what it is and ill just have to rank back up again. Once again sorry
thx a lot! :D
Is it possible to get a role you didn't want
So when you queue in ranked you pick 2 roles. You will always get one of the 2 roles you picked.
Selected Top and Jungle and got put with supp? Bug or intended after a long queue?? Was only like 5 minutes.
That's weird, your best bet is to send in a support ticket about that with info about which game it was. Then we can go from there and try to investigate what happened.
Will steps be taken to ban those who go to a different position than one they chose? In my third game, the guy who picked support instalocked Tristana for adc, ruined the game
That is definitely a bannable offense. make sure to report them after game for that.
So when someone disregards their assigned role can you pick up that when reviewing the report?
Why cant I select chroma packs in champ select. There is no option under the skin tab in this new layout.{{champion:267}}

This should be fixed next patch, it is currently up on the PBE.
Something was bound to be overlooked, so no chroma packs in ranked til next patch friend
Will ranked teams be returning ? :)
will riot ever reply to this :(
Yeah I was confused about this and went into a ranked 5v5 thinking it would be a ranked team score, It wasn't.
Surely it will be, there was no announcement saying that they were going to remove them after all.

They need to fix this lock in mess...I went through about 12 champ selects and about 55minutes for my first game, which we won in 20mins...then the exact same thing happened for my second game... took 50mins to actually get into game, in which we had 2 afk and lost in 20mins... 40 min game time for nearly 3 hours of sitting here...

Ruined duo que for me and my friend. If i choose Bot/support and he picks support/bot it wont let us que. One of us has to choose fill as a secondary role and always get mid/jungle/top. Pretty much stopped us from ever playing a duo bot ever again. Please fix

Riot You should have a Warning System When your Baning so if theres a Darius in our team and i ban darius is should say like "Are you sure u want to ban this champion that someone in your team has chosen" would be Helpfull
{{summoner:31}}
50 minutes to start last game? I hope there will be improvement soon. :)
new system is so stupid I forget to lock in twice so I have to wait 30 mins.
will we get this in normals at some point?
We will be getting the new champ select for blind pick normals soon™

In the previous season at the end I only played ranked 5's due to the fact I didn't want to play soloq anymore because of the flaming and trolling that happened so often, in the ranked 5's we had friends who were unranked for the season, if when we finish our 10 placements they get placed into a rank 2 divisions higher or lower, how do you expect us as a team to play together for the rest of the season?
the new season kicks off. it will be an interesting one this year!
New system is stupid some people never lock in and it takes longer pls return to old system
It's a new system, so everyone is still getting familiar with how it works. Give it time, plus you can help your teammates by reminding them in chat to lock in their choices :)
actually I love this system very much!{{champion:222}}
I was shouting at my team the whole time to make sure they locked in their champs and, guess what? THEY DIDN'T LOCK IN. was waiting forever and no one ever locked in.
best system ever
Screw you Rito, why can't i take a shit during champ select now.{{summoner:30}}

Hi Riot. I need an explanation. So I was B2 last season at the end and played pre season and did well and won nearly all my matches. So I just finished my 10 placement matches and won 9/10 getting fed every single match and carrying my team to victory with my friend who also did just as good (B5 last season). I ended up in Bronze 5???????????????? Please explain what happened? My friend also ended up in B5 and we teamed up with another duo pair who won 8/10 matches and also got into B5 but they didn't play pre season. {{champion:32}} I did so good so how did I g et from B2 to B5 from winning 9/10 matches :(?
This happened to me last season. Bronze 1, won 10 matches solo queue, Bronze 5 placement...

It's slightly based on the MMR of your team and your opponents i.e if youre vsing low elo and stomping them it doesnt count asmuch as if you were vsing high elo. It's a shame, but that's how it is sometimes. GOOD LUCK ON THE CLIMB
Then how come I'm not being place with higher elo players if I am stomping the lower ones?
You duoing with your friend probably had something to do with it because your mmr will be dragged down if they are lower than you and making vs low elo players.

worst system ever, takes 30mins to find a game and make sure everyone (i mean every single person must pay attention every second). this unfairly increases wait time for specific roles, takes so much longer and is completely useless upgrade (if you can even call it that). we want to get in games asap, old system with 15 sec time slots. why didnt team builder work before? it cause it bloody took too long for anything to get right
You should make it so you can pick one role, but potentially have to wait longer. I only play support, so am screwed if I get put anywhere else (and unlucky for my teammates). Rip support life.

I don't understand the need to punish summoners for not locking in, just let the hovered pick go through. Simply reducing the time each summoner has to pick a champ (maybe 10-20s shorter) would achieve the same thing, without being so negative to the ranked community.

I don't like this :(
I used to watch you tube while i wait for my match ups and now i have to stare into a boring screen and read the same thing and look at the same picture for like 3 minutes can you change it so it comes strait to your front screen over everything else like it used to now i have to wait almost every time
So is the new champion select live now in the dynamic queues and solo queue?
Nvm haha gj rito will try the new champ select eventually, looks great!
Let the games begin! So excited for new champ select. Old champ select is literally the reason I haven't hardly played any Summoner's Rift for a long time. Good work, Riot :)
Rip sliver{{item:3070}}{{item:3070}}{{item:3070}}
aghh, i didn't realize that you had to lock in, so now i have to wait halfa to play a game... no impressed
i hate this stupid lock in now im so used to leting it run orthe client coming to front of the screen when its my go{{summoner:31}} ill throw this at whoever decided to mess with me like this
I hate having to lock in. I've already "dodged" twice because I forgot. What is the reason for this? Is it really necessary?
i have waited up to 40 minutes waiting to actually get into champ select and been through 4 before i got into a game. please either revert back to the old one or refine this piece of shit. thank you
WTF! You have to lock that is so dumb!!!
